name: Eleanor Allen
text: A5: Follow your heart, dream big, tell at least 3 influential people about your dreams & aspirations, find advocates/allies of both genders, never stop networking, take risks and don't be afraid to fail! #socent @CartierAwards @waterforpeople

name: Eleanor Allen
text: @CartierAwards My advice: just start. Don't wait for a grand plan or the perfect opportunity. We still have a long way to go at Devex, but we actively promote diversity every day. #socent

name: Eleanor Allen
text: @CartierAwards A key point is being proactive about diversity - in every sense of the word, for every role, and in every location. If you try to just bring diversity to one team or in one way, you're missing out. #socent

name: Eleanor Allen
text: When a woman or non-binary femme says they're going to change the world, the assumption is they're going to start a nonprofit. When a guy say he's going to change the world, people aren't assuming he's going to start a nonprofit. #socent //t.co/9z879FT5St

name: Eleanor Allen
text: @EleanorH2O @waterforpeople Thank you for highlighting the importance of building communities for women entrepreneurs! This is precisely what we are seeking to achieve with the #CartierAwards

name: Eleanor Allen
text: #socent @cartierawards from a personal perspective, the bigger an impact @beluwater makes, the more I worry about 'messing up'. It is hard to remain #selfconfident in challenging economic times. Is that about being a women or because messing up is lives not financial dividend?
